SELECT STK_CODE CODE_ID, STK_DESC CODE_NAME
FROM SYS0026M

SELECT LOCATE AS loc, STK_CODE AS itmcode, STK_DESC AS itmdesc, SUM (BQTY) AS baseqty, SUM (MQTY) AS currqty, (SUM (BQTY) + SUM (MQTY)) AS varqty, (s28m.WH_LOC_CODE || ' - ' || s28m.WH_LOC_DESC) AS mainloc, type.CODE_NAME AS itmtype, ctgry.CODE_NAME AS itmctgry, um.CODE_NAME AS uom, SUM (ZQTY) AS smgiqty, SUM (KQTY) AS smgrqty, (SUM (ZQTY) - SUM (KQTY)) smfinalqty, SUM (USZQTY) AS stgiqty, SUM (USKQTY) AS stgrqty, (SUM (USZQTY) - SUM (USKQTY)) stfinalqty
FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER (LOCATE) AS locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, 0 AS BQTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT = 'S' THEN (QTY * 1) ELSE (QTY * -1) END ) MQTY, 0 AS ZQTY, 0 AS KQTY, 0 AS USZQTY , 0 AS USKQTY
FROM ( SELECT INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE, DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT, MATRL_NO, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT TRNSC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOG0046M WHERE MOV_TYPE = LOG0060D.INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE ) IN ('PO', 'OG', 'AD') THEN ( CASE WHEN INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE = 'AD02' THEN STORG_LOC ELSE RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC END ) ELSE STORG_LOC END) AS locate, STORG_LOC, RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC, QTY FROM LOG0060D WHERE DOC_POSTNG_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20180228' AND AUTO_CRT_ITM = 'M' ), SYS0026M s26 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = MATRL_NO (+) GROUP BY locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, STK_TYPE_ID, STK_CTGRY_ID, UOM
UNION ALL
SELECT LOG_ID AS locate, s26.STK_CODE, s26.STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, QTY AS BQTY, 0 AS MQTY, 0 AS ZQTY , 0 AS KQTY , 0 AS USZQTY , 0 AS USKQTY
FROM SYS0026M s26, LOG0088M l88 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = l88.STK_CODE (+) AND l88.ZMONTH = TO_CHAR (ADD_MONTHS (TO_DATE ('20180101', 'YYYYMMDD'), -1), 'YYYYMM')
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_NUMBER (LOCATE) AS locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, 0 AS BQTY, 0 AS MQTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT = 'S' THEN (QTY * 1) ELSE (QTY * -1) END ) AS zqty, 0 AS KQTY, 0 AS USZQTY , 0 AS USKQTY
FROM ( SELECT INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE, DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT, MATRL_NO, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT TRNSC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOG0046M WHERE MOV_TYPE = LOG0060D.INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE ) IN ('PO', 'OG', 'AD') THEN ( CASE WHEN INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('UM93', 'UM03', 'UM94', 'UM04') THEN STORG_LOC ELSE RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC END ) ELSE STORG_LOC END) AS locate, STORG_LOC, RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC, QTY FROM LOG0060D WHERE DOC_POSTNG_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20180228' AND AUTO_CRT_ITM = 'A' AND INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('UM93', 'UM03', 'UM94', 'UM04') ), SYS0026M s26 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = MATRL_NO GROUP BY locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, STK_TYPE_ID, STK_CTGRY_ID, UOM
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_NUMBER (LOCATE) AS locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, 0 AS BQTY, 0 AS MQTY, 0 AS ZQTY, SUM ( CASE WHEN DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT = 'S' THEN (QTY * 1) ELSE (QTY * -1) END ) AS kqty, 0 AS USZQTY , 0 AS USKQTY FROM (SELECT INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE, DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT, MATRL_NO, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT TRNSC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOG0046M WHERE MOV_TYPE = LOG0060D.INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE) IN ('PO', 'OG', 'AD') THEN ( CASE WHEN INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('UM05', 'UM95', 'UM06', 'UM96') THEN STORG_LOC ELSE RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC END ) ELSE STORG_LOC END) AS locate, STORG_LOC, RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC, QTY FROM LOG0060D WHERE DOC_POSTNG_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20180228' AND AUTO_CRT_ITM = 'M' AND INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('UM05', 'UM95', 'UM06', 'UM96') ), SYS0026M s26 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = MATRL_NO GROUP BY locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, STK_TYPE_ID, STK_CTGRY_ID, UOM
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_NUMBER (LOCATE) AS locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, 0 AS BQTY, 0 AS MQTY, 0 AS ZQTY, 0 AS KQTY , SUM ( CASE WHEN DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT = 'S' THEN (QTY * 1) ELSE (QTY * -1) END ) AS USZQTY, 0 AS USKQTY FROM ( SELECT INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE, DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT, MATRL_NO, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT TRNSC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOG0046M WHERE MOV_TYPE = LOG0060D.INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE) IN ('PO', 'OG', 'AD') THEN ( CASE WHEN INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('US03', 'US93', 'US04', 'US94') THEN STORG_LOC ELSE RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC END ) ELSE STORG_LOC END ) AS locate, STORG_LOC, RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC, QTY FROM LOG0060D WHERE DOC_POSTNG_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20180228' AND AUTO_CRT_ITM = 'A' AND INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('US03', 'US93', 'US04', 'US94') ), SYS0026M s26 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = MATRL_NO GROUP BY locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, STK_TYPE_ID, STK_CTGRY_ID, UOM
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_NUMBER (LOCATE) AS locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s26.STK_TYPE_ID, s26.STK_CTGRY_ID, s26.UOM, 0 AS BQTY, 0 AS MQTY, 0 AS ZQTY, 0 AS KQTY, 0 AS USZQTY , SUM ( CASE WHEN DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT = 'S' THEN (QTY * 1) ELSE (QTY * -1) END ) USKQTY
FROM ( SELECT INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE, DEBT_CRDIT_INDICT, MATRL_NO, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT TRNSC_TYPE_CODE FROM LOG0046M WHERE MOV_TYPE = LOG0060D.INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE) IN ('PO', 'OG', 'AD') THEN ( CASE WHEN INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('US05', 'US95', 'US06', 'US96') THEN STORG_LOC ELSE RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC END ) ELSE STORG_LOC END ) AS locate, STORG_LOC, RCIV_ISSU_STORG_LOC, QTY FROM LOG0060D WHERE DOC_POSTNG_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20180228' AND AUTO_CRT_ITM = 'M' AND INVNTRY_MOV_TYPE IN ('US05', 'US95', 'US06', 'US96') ), SYS0026M s26 WHERE s26.STK_CODE = MATRL_NO GROUP BY locate, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, STK_TYPE_ID, STK_CTGRY_ID, UOM ) t1, sys0028m s28m, SYS0013M type, SYS0013M ctgry, SYS0013M um WHERE t1.LOCATE IS NOT NULL AND s28m.WH_LOC_ID = t1.LOCATE AND type.CODE_ID = t1.STK_TYPE_ID AND ctgry.CODE_ID = t1.STK_CTGRY_ID AND um.CODE_ID = t1.UOM GROUP BY LOCATE, STK_CODE, STK_DESC, s28m.WH_LOC_DESC, TYPE.CODE_NAME, ctgry.CODE_NAME, um.CODE_NAME, s28m.WH_LOC_CODE
